Token.Abstract: Extensions to simplfy common tasks with NSError
Does all the dirty work of creating a simple NSError object.

Parameter.Name: domain
Parameter.Abstract: The error domain - this can be one of the predefined NSError domains.

Parameter.Name: code
Parameter.Abstract: The error code for the error

Parameter.Name: description
Parameter.Abstract: A NSString containing the description of the error

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns an NSError object for domain with the specified error code and description
